Offered are both Bresnahan poses with EPDG backs. The portrait does have extremely small pinholes (staples?) to the left of his ear and one on his forehead above the left eye. 

Portrait$90
[STRIKE]Bat         $235[/STRIKE] SOLD

If you are interested please send an email: [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url]. No PMs, please. PP f/f can be made at [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url]. Add $3.50 for shipping.

Thank you for looking!

Cheers,
Mike
